title: SYSTEM$REVOKE_STAGE_PRIVATELINK_ACCESS | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Revokes the authorization for Snowflake to access the Microsoft Azure Private Endpoint for Azure private endpoints for internal stages
for the current account.
SYSTEM$AUTHORIZE_STAGE_PRIVATELINK_ACCESS , Revoking Private Endpoints to access Snowflake internal stages
The unique identifier for the Private Endpoint in Azure.
Snowflake uses this endpoint value to access the internal stage through the Azure internal network to avoid the public Internet.
For instructions on how to obtain this value, see Configuring private endpoints to access Snowflake internal stages.
Only account administrators (i.e. users with the ACCOUNTADMIN role) can execute this function.

This function can be used with Snowflake accounts on Azure. This function is not supported for Snowflake accounts on Amazon Web Services
or Google Cloud Platform.
Revoke Snowflake to access the Private Endpoint in Azure:
